description: This file is a shell script containing utility functions for build automation and environment setup, such as environment variable checks, property file combination, and mini-mirror creation for deployment purposes.

methods.name: checkEnv
methods.description: Checks if specified environment variables are set and not empty; exits with error if any are missing.

methods.name: combinePropertyDefs
methods.description: Combines multiple property definition JSON files into a single JSON array file.

methods.name: createMiniMirror
methods.description: Creates a mini-mirror of certain files and directories for deployment or archival purposes.
